title: アオハル杯5戦目・決戦を終えて

text.jpText:
最終戦の結果は引き分け。それでも以前より
格段に成長していることを実感し、
次は必ずと気合いを入れ直すのだった。
text.enText:
The result of the final game was a draw. Even 
so, they felt that they had grown up 
considerably from before, and they were 
determined to do better next time. They were 
determined to make it to the next round.

text.jpText:
一方、リトルココンたちは、樫本代理に
今朝、目標タイムを越えることが出来たと
凛々しく報告する。
text.enText:
Meanwhile, the returconers report to Deputy 
Kashimoto that they were able to exceed 
their target time this morning. They report 
to Deputy Kashimoto in a dignified manner 
that they were able to beat their target 
time this morning.

text.jpText:
そして、大好きな樫本代理に
凝り固まった信念を打ち破って欲しくて、
限界に挑戦していたことを明かす。
text.enText:
And she wanted her favorite deputy, 
Kashimoto, to break through her entrenched 
beliefs. She reveals that she was 
pushing her limits.

text.jpText:
その想いが届いたのか、樫本代理は
管理主義体制を撤廃。理事長代理を
降りて、1からやり直す決意をする。
text.enText:
Perhaps her thoughts were received, Acting 
Director Kashimoto eliminated the 
managerialist system. She decided to step 
down from her position as acting director and 
start over from scratch.

text.jpText:
今後は、学園のトレーナーとして働くことが
決まる。リトルココンたちは彼女の元へと
駆け付けるのだった。
text.enText:
She will now work as a trainer at the school. 
The Little Conquerors rushed to her to her.
